articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Pak Yong Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Bier of Pak Yong Sun
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un on Tuesday sent a wreath to the bier of People's Artiste Pak Yong Sun, advisor to the Mansudae Art Troupe, expressing deep condolences over his death.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Leaves to Visit African Countries
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Leaves to Visit African Countries
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, left here on Tuesday to pay official goodwill visits to some African countries.
					 Among his suite members are Kang Ha Guk, minister of Public Health, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, So Kil Bok, vice-minister of External Economic Relations.
					
					 They were seen off at Pyongyang International Airport by Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Ri Su Yong, minister of Foreign Affairs, Kim Hyong Hun, vice-minister of Public Health, and officials concerned.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Swiss Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets Swiss Ambassador
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong met and had a talk with Jean-Jacques de Dardel, Swiss ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on Tuesday.

articles.title: Reception Given by Swiss Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Swiss Ambassador
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Jean-Jacques de Dardel, Swiss ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception on Tuesday to mark the 40th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and the Swiss Confederation.
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Kil Song, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Sim Kuk Ryong, director of the General Bureau for Affairs with Diplomatic Corps, officials concerned, foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here.
					
					 Staff members of the Swiss embassy, Thomas Fisler, country director of the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation, and its staff members were on hand.

articles.title: Photo Exhibition Marks Anniversary of Diplomatic Ties between DPRK and Switzerland
articles.content:
Photo Exhibition Marks Anniversary of Diplomatic Ties between DPRK and Switzerland
						
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Photo exhibition "The Swiss Touch in Landscape Architecture" opened at the Pyongyang Center for Cultural Exchange with Foreign Countries on Tuesday on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Switzerland.
					 Present there were Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries who is chairman of the DPRK-Switzerland Friendship Association, officials concerned, teachers and students of Pyongyang University of Architecture, Jean-Jacques de Dardel, Swiss ambassador to the DPRK, Thomas Fisler, country director of the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation in the DPRK, staff members of the Swiss embassy and the agency.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys here.
					
					 Speakers expressed the conviction that the photo exhibition would contribute to deepening the bonds of friendship between the two peoples.
					
					 Then the participants looked round the photos on display.

articles.title: Ground-breaking Ceremony of Rebuilding Railroad Section Held
articles.content:
Ground-breaking Ceremony of Rebuilding Railroad Section Held
						
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- A ground-breaking ceremony of rebuilding the section of Jaedong-Kangdong-Nampho railway stations took place at East Pyongyang Railway Station Tuesday.
					 Present there were Minister of External Economic Relations Ri Ryong Nam who doubles as chairman of the DPRK side to the Inter-Governmental Committee for Cooperation in Trade, Economy, Science and Technology between the DPRK and Russia, officials concerned and working people in the city.
					
					 Also on hand were Minister of Development of Far East of Russia Alexandr Galushka who doubles as chairman of the Russian side to the Inter-Governmental Committee for Cooperation in Trade, Economy, Science and Technology between the DPRK and Russia, and his party, Alexandr Timonin, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, staff members of his embassy and foreign diplomatic envoys here.
					
					 Oleg Shishov, director general of the Russian Bridzh Group, and Won Phil Jong, senior vice-minister of Railways of the DPRK, made speeches at the ceremony.
					
					 They said that they were pleased that the ceremony of weighty significance in economic development between the two countries was being held in Pyongyang this year marking the 66th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Russia.
					
					 The project for remodeling railways, the first stage of realizing the large-scale cooperation project which is in line with the common development and interests of the peoples of the two countries, marked an important occasion in developing economic cooperation between the two countries, they noted.
					
					 Alexandr Galushka and Ri Ryong Nam made congratulatory speeches.
					
					 They said that Marshal Kim Jong Un is paying deep attention to boosting the bilateral friendly relations.
					
					 The relations of economic cooperation between the two countries are growing stronger with each passing day, they said, hoping for bigger successes in the work to develop the bilateral cooperative relations in the future, too.
					
					 A reception was given that day.

articles.title: 25th National Software Contest and Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
25th National Software Contest and Exhibition Opens
						
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The 25th national software contest and exhibition opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House here on Tuesday.
					 The software contest will be divided into such panels as software-making tool, computer virus vaccine, simulation experiment and practice, remote-control education, software for analyzing simulation sports games and translation program.
					
					 The software exhibition will be divided into 17 panels including operating system and security, artificial intelligence and Korean language information processing and introduction of CNC system into production process. At least a thousand computer programs and various devices and components will be displayed at the exhibition.
					
					 Among them are the successes ministries, national institutions and industrial establishments have made by putting their work systems on an IT basis and programs presented by teachers, researchers and students of universities, colleges and computer talents-training centers.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Jin, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, officials concerned and program developers. 
					
					 Choe Sang Gon, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, made an opening address.
					
					 He underlined the need to make contributions to developing Korean-style program-making technology and more dynamically stepping up the drive for putting the national economy on an IT basis.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants looked round the exhibition.

articles.title: DPRK Football Team Advances into Finals at Asian U-19 Football Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Football Team Advances into Finals at Asian U-19 Football Championship
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK men's football team advanced into the finals in the 2014 Asian U-19 Football Championship.
					 It trounced its Uzbek rival 5:0 in the semi-finals on Monday.
					
					 It will play the finals with the Qatar team on Thursday.

articles.title: Results of DPRK Championships in Some Events
articles.content:
Results of DPRK Championships in Some Events
						
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK championships are now at high peak in Pyongyang and other parts of the country, drawing deep interest of experts and fans.
					 20-odd events have already come to close such as volleyball, baseball, softball, field hockey, judo and wrestling.
					
					 In the A-class table-tennis team events, the titles were taken by men of the Amnokgang Sports Team and women of the Hwaebul Sports Team.
					
					 The regulation-ball tennis men's and women's team titles were taken by the Kigwancha Sports Team and the softball tennis men's and women's team titles by the Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry Sports Team and the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill Sports Team.
					
					 As of Monday, five new national records were set at the shooting, archery and swimming events. In particular, a woman player of the April 25 Sports Team broke the national records in 100-meter freestyle and breaststroke swimming.
					
					 The championships will last until November.

articles.title: Stamps Showing Historical Relics Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
Stamps Showing Historical Relics Issued in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK issued four kinds of stamps showing some historical relics in Kaesong City.
					 The stamps feature Kaesong Chomsongdae (Astronomical Observatory), Seven Tombs Cluster (third tomb), Sungyang Confucian Shrine and Phyochung Monuments, which were registered as world cultural heritages in late June Juche 102 (2013).
					
					 Kaesong Chomsongdae is a stone structure built in 919 as the central astronomical observatory base of Koryo Kingdom (918-1392).
					
					 Seven Tombs Cluster is believed to be constructed in the closing years of Koryo.
					
					 Sungyang Confucian Shrine in Sonjuk-dong of Kaesong City is a wooden building built in the period of the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910).
					
					 Phyochung Monuments were erected by the kings of the Feudal Joson Dynasty in praise of Jong Mong Ju's loyalty (1337-1392).

articles.title: Steady Increase in Koryo Medicine Production
articles.content:
Steady Increase in Koryo Medicine Production 
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- A signal boost was reported from the management bureaus of Koryo medicine production across the country.
					 The Pothonggang, Tongdaewon, Moranbong and Junggu Koryo medicine factories under the Pyongyang City Management Bureau of Koryo Medicine Production put extraction and capsulation of Koryo medicine onto a high level and overfulfilled their yearly production plans.
					
					 The Phyongchon Koryo Medicine Factory is increasing varieties of medicines by developing new medicines, and improving their packing and producing efficacious medicines.
					
					 The Kanggye Koryo Medicine Processing Factory under the Jagang Provincial Management Bureau of Koryo Medicine Production carried out its yearly plan at 105 percent in October by boosting the production of medicaments required by masses and extractive Koryo medicine. 
					
					 Factories under the North Phyongan, South Hwanghae and North Hamgyong provincial management bureaus of Koryo medicine production secured a lot of raw material resources while increasing the production of reserve medicines and those required by masses through the improvement of management of  equipment and technical control.
					
					 The Yomju, Unryul, Hoeryong and other Koryo medicine factories are channeling efforts into putting the production processes on a sterilized and dust-free basis in the wake of their fulfillment of their yearly production quotas.

articles.title: Researchers in DPRK Strives for Mushroom Cultivation
articles.content:
Researchers in DPRK Strives for Mushroom Cultivation
						
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The Central Mushroom Research Institute under the State Academy of Sciences in the DPRK has made a lot of  scientific achievements to boost the mushroom production in the country.
					 Ri Son Hui, head of the Institute, told KCNA:
					
					 When visiting the Institute in October last year, supreme leader Kim Jong Un called for priority to scientific researches in order to put the mushroom production on an industrial basis.
					
					 In hearty response to his instruction, we researchers have made all possible efforts in researches into mushroom cultivation, producing good results.
					
					 Over the past one year, the Institute developed new kind of supplementary nutritive compound, established a method of cultivating a new kind of mushroom with bigger efficacy and reared 10-odd strains of mushroom growing well on rice straw.
					
					 Besides, its researchers developed an environment monitoring and control system and solved many sci-tech problems arising in mushroom cultivation on farms across the country.

articles.title: By Our Nation Itself Represents Stand for Reconciliation, Unity and Independent Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
By Our Nation Itself Represents Stand for Reconciliation, Unity and Independent Reunification: Rodong Sinmun 
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- What is important for improving the inter-Korean relations and bringing about a radical turn in the drive for national reunification is to maintain the stand of By Our Nation Itself, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in an article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 What is essential for improving the bedeviled north-south relations at present is to have the stance to solve all issues by depending on the nation, believing in its efforts. 
					
					 The root cause of deteriorating the north-south relations is the extreme hostility and inveterate repugnancy towards fellow countrymen. Recently there took place a provocative anti-DPRK leaflet-scattering operation in south Korea chilling the atmosphere for mending the north-south relations, arousing grave concern of the public at home and abroad. Such operation conducted by human scum is a very dangerous one spoiling the hard-won atmosphere for mending the north-south relations. 
					
					 In order to radically improve the north-south relations it is necessary to boldly drop the old conception of groundlessly doubting and antagonizing the fellow countrymen in the north and sincerely desire reconciliation and unity in the spirit of By Our Nation Itself. 
					
					 It is an important requirement for taking the stand of By Our Nation Itself to reject flunkeyism and dependence on outsiders. 
					
					 Koreans should hold aloft the banner of By Our Nation Itself to put an end to the U.S. interference in the matters of the Korean nation and achieve the independent reunification of the country. The reality today, in particular, when  outside forces are becoming evermore undisguised in their moves for domination and interference in the matters related to the inter-Korean relations, calls for more firmly adhering to the independent stand in settling the issues of the nation. 
					
					 Inexhaustible is the united strength of the nation. No formidable outside forces can ever overpower it. 
					
					 When Koreans are firmly confident of their own strength, they will have guts to solve all the problems according to their own viewpoint and confidence and stand up against any interference and pressure from outside forces.

articles.title: U.S. Can Never Evade Blame for Blocking Solution to Nuclear Issue: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Can Never Evade Blame for Blocking Solution to Nuclear Issue: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- It is two decades since the DPRK-U.S. agreed framework was adopted, but their relations are at the lowest ebb. This is entirely because the U.S. has persisted in its deep-rooted hostile policy toward the DPRK. Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in an article.
					 The U.S. approached the DPRK-U.S. agreed framework with a black-hearted intention from the outset and has blocked the way of settling the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula peacefully, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is staging madcap nuclear war maneuvers against the DPRK in south Korea and its vicinity every year with lots of nuclear weapons involved. This is an open nuclear threat and blackmail against the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK has made every possible sincere effort to defuse the ever-growing nuclear threat of the U.S. The DPRK put forth a proposal for building a nuclear-free zone through peaceful dialogue and negotiations and combined it with the method of removing the U.S. nuclear threat by relying on international law.
					
					 The U.S., however, made the situation complicated, persistently circulating a suspicion about nuclear development in the DPRK. It imposed "special inspection" on the DPRK and openly posed nuclear threat to it while resuming nuclear war drills. The U.S. used the NPT as a lever for stifling the DPRK.
					
					 The situation will remain unchanged as long as the U.S. persists in its hostile acts against the DPRK, not abandoning its ambition to stifle the social system in the DPRK. This is the lesson and conclusion drawn by the DPRK once again, looking back on the past history at present, 20 years since the adoption of the DPRK-U.S. agreed framework to settle the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Instead of taking issue with the DPRK over its nuclear deterrence, the U. S. should reflect on its acts of creating the present situation and take a proper attitude, though belatedly. This is the only way of making a breakthrough towards settling the nuclear issue on the peninsula.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses Danger of U.S. Development of New-type Weapons
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses Danger of U.S. Development of New-type Weapons 
						
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The U.S. navy announced shortly ago that it would deploy newly developed unmanned robotic patrol boat.
					 According to those concerned of the U.S. navy institute, the patrol boat will perform the mission of guarding U.S. warships when they pass through the Strait of Malacca, the Strait of Hormuz and other major international sea routes.
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary observes: This indicates that the U.S. seeks to seize major international sea routes and hold military hegemony in the region.
					
					 The ulterior purpose of the U.S. is to realize world domination and to this end, it counts on the unchallenged edge in the military field, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is in the grip of a serious financial crisis and in the position to drastically cut down its military spending. Yet, it has rolled up its sleeves to develop new-type weapons.
					
					 Noteworthy here is that the U.S. development of new-type weapons is not just aimed to conduct military operations in a certain region but it is being pushed forward with all the regions of the world in mind.
					
					 The U.S. world domination strategy to hold military supremacy not only on the ground and in the air and sea but also in cyberspace has seriously dashed human hope for peace and increased the danger of a war in different parts of the world.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. military domination strategy is playing the role of a catalyst sparking off worldwide arms race.
					
					 The U.S. frantic moves for the development of new-type weapons are arousing vigilance and concern of other countries. Many countries have opted for arms buildup, challenging the U.S. military domination strategy.
					
					 This proves that the U.S. is the harasser of global peace and chief criminal triggering off arms race.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Refutes S. Korean Media's Misinformation
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Refutes S. Korean Media's Misinformation 
						
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Some south Korean media are floating such misinformation that the north deliberately hinted at the abortion of the expected second round of the north-south high-level contact.
					 This is another provocation to the north which has made every possible effort to make dialogue successful for reconciliation and unity of all Koreans and a sinister act of chilling the hard-won atmosphere of north-south dialogue.
					
					 All Koreans and the world public sincerely hoped that the good atmosphere for mending the inter-Korean relations provided by the talks between the high-ranking officials from the north and the south in Inchon on Oct. 4 would lead to repairing the north-south relations and stabilizing the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Regrettably, the hard-won atmosphere of reconciliation is facing a serious challenge from its beginning, due to the dishonest behavior of the south Korean authorities who have not yet got rid of their outdated idea of confrontation.
					
					 The south Korean chief executive, at the recent ASEM Summit held in Milan, Italy dared rattle the nerves of the DPRK by asserting "the north should undergo a genuine change, dismantle its nukes and open its closed door." She also ballyhooed about "human rights of inhabitants in the north and their hard living," jabbering that "the north should approach dialogue with sincerity, away from its double-dealing attitude."
					
					 She again grumbled in the international arena about the north's nuclear deterrence which serves as a mighty treasured sword for protecting the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the nation under the prevailing situation and provides a sure guarantee for preserving peace and security and successfully pushing ahead with economic construction and the work for improving people's standard of living. What she uttered is nothing but an expression of undisguised repugnancy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Explicitly speaking once again, the DPRK can never abandon its nuclear deterrence unless the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and its nuclear threat against all Koreans are completely stopped. The DPRK's nukes can never be bartered for anything.
					
					 The DPRK never forgets that the south Korean authorities hurled riff-raffs into staging a leaflet-scattering operation against it in the wake of the north-south high-level talks in a bid to chill the atmosphere of the improvement of the north-south relations. It was none other than the south Korean authorities who connived at, manipulated and zealously backed the operations behind the scene, asserting "they were conducted by a non-governmental organization of its own accord and there was no legal ground to halt them."
					
					 All facts clearly show who is making the prospect of dialogue gloomy.
					
					 One cannot but question whether it is possible to hold the second round of the north-south high-level contact under such deplorable situation as now.
					
					 To the regret of all Koreans, the present situation is quite contrary to the hard-won atmosphere for the improvement of the north-south relations.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations are now at the crucial crossroads -- whether to repeat the evil cycle of confrontation or to rev up the atmosphere for their improvement and enter a path of fresh development.
					
					 Now is the time to make a policy decision helpful to creating the atmosphere of dialogue and bringing about peaceful environment, not an anachronistic act against a dialogue partner.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly hope for the next round of high-level contact for the improvement of the inter-Korean relations, they should be prudent in talking and deed and move to create an atmosphere for repairing the relations, to begin with.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Prosecution Denounced for Violating Academic Freedom
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Prosecution Denounced for Violating Academic Freedom 
						
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet prosecution sentenced Ri Yong Sop, former chairman of the Association for Supporting Jaju Minbo, to two years in prison and two years of suspension of qualifications, on charges of violation of the "Security Law" on October 16.
					 The prosecution authorities took this action, accusing him of possession of "With the Century", reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Protesting against this, Ri held that as a historical researcher, he just studied the revolutionary activities of the President who led the anti-Japanese armed struggle, adding that it is unwarranted to label the study "enemy-benefiting".
					
					  He blasted the prosecution for violating the academic freedom and the freedom of thought and expression.

articles.title: 3rd DPRK-China Economy, Trade, Culture and Tourism Expo Held in China
articles.content:
3rd DPRK-China Economy, Trade, Culture and Tourism Expo Held in China
						
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The 3rd DPRK-China economy, trade, culture and tourism expo took place in Dandong, China from Oct. 16 to 20.
					 There took place such events as trade fair, fine arts exhibition, photo exhibition on tourism and art performance during the expo.
					
					 Exhibits at the trade fair and exhibitions included products made in the DPRK and China such as farm machines, foodstuff, daily necessities, medicines, Korean paintings, oil paintings, graphic paintings, embroidery goods and other fine art works and photos showing scenic spots in both countries.
					
					 There were a briefing on the DPRK-China joint venture and investment in economy and trade and a ceremony of signing the paper on articles.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Studied in Thailand, Slovakia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Studied in Thailand, Slovakia
						
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- A seminar and a reading-session on leader Kim Jong Il's work "Socialism Is a Science" took place in Thailand and Slovakia on Oct. 11 and 13.
					 The chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand said in a speech that as soon as Kim Jong Il's work was published, it evoked a lively response among the world people.
					
					 He noted that the work is shedding its rays as an immortal banner indicating the road to be followed by progressive humankind, adding that, profound in its contents, it serves as guidelines for the world socialist movement. 
					
					 The secretary general of the above-said organization said that the publication of Kim Jong Il's work marked an event to be specially recorded in the history of human thoughts.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il in his work scientifically analyzed the course of the development of history and, on this basis, clarified the scientific accuracy of socialism and the inevitability of its victory. 
					
					 He firmly defended the socialist cause with his Songun politics and protected the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK from all sorts of imperialists' moves to stifle it.
					
					 We will intensify our activities for studying and disseminating the work.
					
					 The chairman of the Slovak Association for Supporting the Juche Idea read the work and said as follows:
					
					 Korean-style socialism is the most scientific socialism with invincible might.
					
					 As Kim Jong Il said, socialism is sure to triumph for its scientific accuracy and truth.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Benin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Benin
						
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The committee of the Socialist Party of Benin for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Cotonou on Oct. 14.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Beninese Figures Praise Kim Jong Il's Feats Performed in Party-building
articles.content:
Beninese Figures Praise Kim Jong Il's Feats Performed in Party-building
						
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Beninese political figures praised leader Kim Jong Il's feats performed in the party building at the inaugural ceremony of the Committee of the Socialist Party of Benin for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il held in Cotonou on Oct. 14.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the party, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), developed the party into the socialist ruling party deeply rooted among the popular masses and absolutely supported and trusted by them.
					
					 He authored famous works such as "On the Fundamental Issue of Revolutionary Party Building" when ruling parties degenerated and socialism was frustrated in various countries at the end of the last century, giving lucid answers to theoretical and practical issues arising in party building and activities.
					
					 His works serve as important guidelines and textbooks teaching revolutionary parties aspiring after socialism how to successfully perform their missions and roles under any difficult and complicated situation.
					
					 The vice-president of the party noted that it is the firm will of Marshal Kim Jong Un to develop the WPK into the party fully meeting the interests of the people and serving them, true to the intention of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Nigerian National Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Inaugurated
articles.content:
Nigerian National Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Inaugurated
						
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian national committee for remembering the great leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Abuja on Oct. 14.
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and widely introduce the achievements made by the Korean people in the drive to defend the sovereignty of the country and build a thriving nation under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 3rd anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Important Days of WPK Marked in Different Countries
articles.content:
Important Days of WPK Marked in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place in Germany, Ethiopia, Angola and Cuba from Oct. 3 to 8 on the occasion of the 17th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and its 69th founding anniversary.
					 The chief of the Hannover Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Germany said that the WPK is a mother party serving the popular masses and that it is the pride of the Korean people to be guided by the great party. The WPK is consolidating socialism centered on the popular masses, he added.
					
					 The chief for construction of a designing supervision agency of Ethiopia and other speakers noted that it is only the WPK in the world absolutely supported and trusted by the people. President Kim Il Sung who founded such party and leader Kim Jong Il who developed it were the great leaders, indeed.
					
					 A general in charge of security and protocol of the Angolan presidency and other speakers praised the WPK for winning one victory after another under the uplifted banner of independence.
					
					 A representative of the Communist Party of Chile permanently stationed in Cuba said that the WPK is the invincible party which has guided to victory the struggle of the Korean people for independence against imperialism and for socialism for the past 69 years.
					
					 A message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the round-table talks held in Cuba.

articles.title: British Organizations Support Proposal for Founding DFRK
articles.content:
British Organizations Support Proposal for Founding DFRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK made public a joint statement on Oct. 11 to mark the 34th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo (DFRK).
					 The statement said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung advanced the most practical proposal of founding the DFRK at the Sixth Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on Oct. 10, 1980.
					
					 The proposal calls for founding a federal state based on one nation and one state, two social systems and two governments, an original line for reunification and the most practical and just proposal.
					
					 Korea's reunification is the cherished desire of all Koreans.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are the very one who caused the Korean division and the aggressors who inflicted misfortune and sufferings on the Koreans.
					
					 The DPRK government has made sincere efforts to carry out the proposal and, particularly, brought about a great epochal turn in the reunification movement by providing the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The proposal to which the idea of independence is applied is the most practical and reasonable one as it clarifies that one party can not force its intention on the other party and that the national reunification should be achieved by the concerted efforts of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Russian Organization Denounces U.S. Human Rights Racket against DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Organization Denounces U.S. Human Rights Racket against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, October 21 (KCNA) -- The Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK released a statement on Oct. 13 in denunciation of the U.S. human rights racket against the DPRK. 
					 The statement said that the U.S. and West media spread the fabricated data on the human rights issue in the DPRK. This vividly shows that they have left no stone unturned to undermine the DRPK and realize domination over the whole of the Korean Peninsula, the statement noted, and went on: 
					
					 The U.S. has resorted to the mean methods against the DPRK including the military pressure and economic sanctions and is getting more unscrupulous in recent days.
					
					 It is mainly because the U.S., who styles itself a world dominator and MP, hasn't yet admitted its defeat in the past Korean War.
					
					 The only solution to all the issues related to the DPRK lies in the detente on the Korean Peninsula and halt to all moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The statement demanded the U.S. stop the moves which betray its ignorance.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de difunto Pak Yong Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante el feretro de difunto Pak Yong Sun
						
Pyongyang, 21 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 21 una ofrenda floral ante el feretro del difunto Pak Yong Sun, Actor del Pueblo y asesor del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae, expresando profundas condolencias por su fallecimiento.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam parte de Pyongyang para visitar paises africanos
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam parte de Pyongyang para visitar paises africanos
						
Pyongyang, 21 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, partio el dia 21 de esta capital para realizar una visita oficial y de amistad a algunos paises africanos.
					Le acompanan el ministro de Salud Publica, Kang Ha Guk, el vicecanciller Kung Sok Ung, el viceministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero, So Gil Pok y otros funcionarios.
					
					Les despidieron en el aeropuerto internacional de Pyongyang el vicepresidente del Presidium de la APS, Kim Yong Tae, el canciller Ri Su Yong, el viceministro de Salud Publica, Kim Hyong Hun, etc.

articles.title: Quien rompe el dialogo, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
Quien rompe el dialogo, comenta ACNC 
Pyongyang, 21 de octubre (ACNC) -- Algunos medios surcoreanos difunden el rumor erroneo de que la parte Norte pone obstaculos al segundo contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur insinuando su aborto. 
					Esto es otra provocacion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que hace todo lo posible por preparar el dialogo favorable a la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales y un grave proceder que ensombrece el clima de dialogo Norte-Sur preparado a duras penas. 
					
					Toda la nacion coreana y la sociedad internacional esperaban tanto que el clima positivo preparado en las conversaciones de las autoridades de alto nivel Norte-Sur efectuadas el 4 de octubre pasado en Inchon, traigan el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas y la estabilidad de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Pero, ese clima tropieza con graves desafios debido al proceder injusto de las autoridades surcoreanas que no se liberan de la vieja concepcion de enfrentamiento. 
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra en la Cumbre Asia-Europa, recien celebrada en Milano, Italia, la mandataria surcoreana insulto atrevidamente a la RPDC soltando disparates tales como el "cambio verdadero del Norte, la grave situacion de DDHH y el dolor de vida de habitantes norcoreanos" y diciendo que "el Norte de Corea debe abandonar sus armas nucleares, abrir la puerta cerrada y hacer el dialogo con la sinceridad liberandose de dualidad". 
					
					De esta manera, volvio a censurar en la palestra internacional el disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC que sirve de remedio todopoderoso para defender la soberania y la dignidad de la nacion frente a la situacion creada y garantiza la paz y seguridad, la construccion economica y la mejora de vida del pueblo. 
					
					Esto es la expresion de abierto veto a la contraparte de dialogo. 
					
					Reiteramos que no podemos renunciar ni cambiar con nada el disuasivo nuclear mientras  no se eliminen la politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC y la amenaza nuclear a la nacion coreana. 
					
					No olvidamos que inmediatamente despues de las conversaciones entre autoridades de alto nivel Norte-Sur efectuadas en Inchon, las autoridades surcoreanas habian instigado a las escorias humanas a lanzar los volantes de contenido anti-RPDC echando agua fria al clima de mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas. En aquel entonces, las autoridades surcoreanas toleraron, manipularon y ayudaron esta campana anti-RPDC diciendo que "es un acto autonomo de la entidad civil" y "no hay el motivo legal".
					
					Tales hechos comprueban quien rompe el dialogo. 
					
					Como se abrira en tal circunstancia el segundo contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur
					
					La situacion de hoy contraviene totalmente al ambiente de mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas preparado tan dificilmente. 
					
					Ahora las relaciones intercoreanas se encuentran en el dilema de repetir la viciosa circulacion de enfrentamiento o entrar en el nuevo camino de desarrollo al seguir manteniendo el ambiente de mejoramiento. 
					
					Ahora se necesitan no los actos anacronicos contra la contraparte de dialogo sino la decision politica favorable al clima de dialogo y al ambiente pacifico. 
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas desean de veras el proximo contacto de alto nivel Norte-Sur para la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas, deben ser prudentes en las palabras y acciones y crear primero el ambiente favorable a la mejora de las relaciones.

articles.title: Exposicion de fotos por dia de establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas Corea-Suiza
articles.content:
Exposicion de fotos por dia de establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas Corea-Suiza 
Pyongyang, 21 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 21 en el Centro de Intercambio Cultural con el Extranjero de Pyongyang la exposicion de fotos "Diseno arquitectonico de paisaje en Suiza" con motivo del 40o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Confederacion de Suiza.
					En la ceremonia inaugural participaron Kim Jin Bom, presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Suiza y vicepresidente del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero y otros funcionarios, los profesores y los estudiantes de la Universidad de Arquitectura de Pyongyang.
					
					Ademas estuvieron presentes el embajador suizo en la RPDC, Jean-Jacques de Dardel, el director de la Agencia Suiza de Desarrollo y Cooperacion en la RPDC, Thomas Fisler, y los miembros de la embajada y dicha agencia de Suiza.
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises en Corea.
					
					En la ocasion los oradores expresaron conviccion de que la presente exhibicion se contribuira a profundizar los lazos de amistad entre los pueblos de los dos paises.
					
					Los participantes recorrieron las fotos expuestas.

articles.title: Acto de inicio de reconstruccion de ferrocarril Jaedong-Kangdong-Nampho
articles.content:
Acto de inicio de reconstruccion de ferrocarril Jaedong-Kangdong-Nampho
						
Pyongyang, 21 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 21 en la Estacion de Pyongyang Este la ceremonia de inicio de reconstruccion de ferrocarril en el tramo de las estaciones  Jaedong-Kangdong-Nampho.
					En la ocasion participaron el ministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Extranjero Ri Ryong Nam, presidente de la parte coreana del Comite Intergubernamental de Cooperacion de Comercio, Economia, Ciencia y Tecnica Corea-Rusia y otros funcionarios interesados y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Ademas estuvieron presentes el ministro de Desarrollo del Lejano Oriente de Rusia, Alexandr Galushka, presidente de la parte rusa del Comite Intergubernamental de Cooperacion de Comercio, Economia, Ciencia y Tecnica Rusia-Corea y su comitiva, el embajador, Alexandr Timonin, y los miembros de la embajada rusa y los delegados diplomaticos de varios paises en Corea.
					
					En la ceremonia, el director general del Grupo Bridge de Rusia, Oleg Shishob y el superior viceministro del Ferrocarril, Won Phil Jong, pronunciaron discursos.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que se sienten alegres de que este ano de 66o aniversario del establecimiento de las relaciones diplomaticas Corea-Rusia, se celebra en esta capital el acto de inicio de reconstruccion de ferrovia que sirve de importancia en el desarrollo economico de dos paises.
					
					Prosiguieron que la reconstruccion del ferrocarril, primera etapa de la materializacion del plan de cooperacion de gran tamano que conviene al desarrollo e interes conjuntos de los pueblos Corea y Rusia, constituye una labor importante que desarrolla la colaboracion economica entre ambos paises.
					
					Alexandr Galushka y Ri Ryong Nam dijeron las palabras de felicitacion.
					
					Ellos subrayaron que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un presta profunda atencion al desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad Corea-Rusia.
					
					Desearon mayores exitos en el trabajo para desarrollar  en el futuro tambien las relaciones de cooperacion bilateral diciendo que las  relaciones de colaboracion economica entre Corea y Rusia se desarrollan cada dia mas.
					
					El mismo dia se ofrecio un banquete en honor del acto de inicio de reconstruccion de ferrovia.
